content.raw:
Sarah,

Since we don’t have access to you custom world and assuming that you either have yesterday [Docker image](#!/osrf/subt/wiki/tutorials/SystemSetupDockerhub) installed or a fresh updated catkin workspace \(`sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get upgrade`, `cd ~/subt_ws/src/tunnel_circuit`, `hg pull && hg up`\), then can you run a test following the first four\(4\) steps in [this tutorial](#!/osrf/subt/wiki/tutorials/CustomControl)?  Let me know if you see the same performance and behavior shown here: [https://vimeo.com/352096820](https://vimeo.com/352096820)
content.html:
Sarah,

Since we don’t have access to you custom world and assuming that you either have yesterday Docker image installed or a fresh updated catkin workspace (sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get upgrade, cd ~/subt_ws/src/tunnel_circuit, hg pull && hg up), then can you run a test following the first four(4) steps in this tutorial? Let me know if you see the same performance and behavior shown here: https://vimeo.com/352096820
